name: PlanetDefense (Ignacio Searles 2)
description:
There is nothing more outdoors than outer-space. Earth is in great danger, some planets are about to crash into us. You must save earth using a interplanetary missile. You must defend earth for 7 days to avoid the end of humanity, good luck.

This game was made for the olc::BeatTheBoredom Game Jam in under 3 hours. It runs in the c++ console. Hope you enjoy.
